text: José Antonio García Leyva (11 January 1960 – 28 November 2003) was a Mexican politician and educator from the Institutional Revolutionary Party. From 2000 to 2003 he served as Deputy of the LVIII Legislature of the Mexican Congress representing Zacatecas. ==References== Category:1960 births Category:2003 deaths Category:Politicians from Zacatecas Category:Mexican educators Category:Members of the Chamber of Deputies (Mexico) Category:Institutional Revolutionary Party politicians Category:21st-century Mexican politicians
title: José Antonio García Leyva
